title: Add support for the Optimize command

comments.author: Coda Hale
comments.content:
This adds support for the Optimize command to solrb. Unit tests, functional tests.

(The patch may be kind of hinky – hopefully it's smart enough to deal with me manually removing unrelated changes from the diff. If it chokes on this, I can apply these changes to a pristine working copy and re-submit.)

comments.author: Erik Hatcher
comments.content: patch was a little hinkey, but i manually patched it.  all is well.  committed.  thanks Coda, you're rocking!
